description: Detects the PowerShell command lines with special characters
name: Suspicious PowerShell Command Line
query: (((process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND (process.command_line:/.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*\+.*/ OR process.command_line:/.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*\{.*/ OR process.command_line:/.*{.*{.*{.*{.*{.*/ OR process.command_line:/.*\^.*\^.*\^.*\^.*\^.*/ OR process.command_line:/.*`.*`.*`.*`.*`.*/)) AND (NOT (process.parent.executable:"C\:\\Program\ Files\\Amazon\\SSM\\ssm\-document\-worker.exe"))) AND (NOT ((process.executable:*\\powershell.exe AND process.command_line:/.*{.*{.*{.*{.*{.*/ AND process.command_line:(*new\ EventSource\(\"Microsoft.Windows.Sense.Client.Management\"* OR *public\ static\ extern\ bool\ InstallELAMCertificateInfo\(SafeFileHandle\ handle\);*)))))
author: Teymur Kheirkhabarov (idea)
Vasiliy Burov (rule)
oscd.community
Tim Shelton (fp)
